name: All the extinguishers in any level
All the alarms in any level
Please recycle: Put a soda can in the wrong place
Environment saved!: Place a soda can in a recycling bin
Wake Up: Entirety of Retrospect cutscene
Why are you like this?: Clone an item too many times
Sugar crash: Break a soda can
Please use other door: Wrong door in Optical
Son of man: Drop an apple on your head
Expert fire alarmist: Pull enough fire alarms (10)
Bring the :pain: egg to the end of Whitespace
Make your screen completely black in a level
Back%: Any level but you can only walk backwards (not retro)
Crab%: Any level but you can only walk left or right (not retro)
Mouse%: Any level with only a mouse (not retro)
All Easter Eggs in Optical & Labyrinth
Superluminal: Beat the game in under 30 minutes
